TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PanelStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style

span.span: Represents the style for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于表示面板控件的样式设置。The class is used to represent the style settings for a panel control. 它封装控制面板外观的属性，并且可以应用于多个面板控件以提供常见的外观。It encapsulates the properties that control the appearance of a panel and can be applied to multiple panel controls to provide a common appearance. 可以通过设置属性来指定要在面板的背景中显示的图像 。You can specify an image to display in the background of the panel by setting the property. 面板内容的水平对齐方式由 属性指示。The horizontal alignment of the contents of the panel is indicated by the property. 可以通过设置属性来指定面板控件中包含文本的控件的方向 。The direction of controls that contain text within the panel control can be specified by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 对象并设置其属性。The following code example demonstrates creating a object and setting its properties. 此示例包含两个部分：This example has two parts: 一个分部类， `PanelStylecs_aspx` 它演示如何创建一个新的 对象并设置其属性。A partial class, `PanelStylecs_aspx`, that demonstrates creating a new object and setting its properties. 使用该 `PanelStylecs_aspx` 示例作为其代码隐藏文件的 Web 窗体页。A Web Forms page that uses the `PanelStylecs_aspx` example as its code-behind file. 该示例的第一部分演示如何创建 对象 `myPanelStyle` 并设置其属性。The first part of the example demonstrates creating a object, `myPanelStyle`, and setting its properties. 然后 `Panel1` ，为面板和面板调用方法 `Panel2` ，并将 `myPanelStyle` 其应用于这两个面板。Then the method is called for both the `Panel1` panel and the `Panel2` panel, and `myPanelStyle` is applied to both of them. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示了与上一个示例一起使用的 .aspx 文件。The second part of the example shows an .aspx file that is used with the previous example. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置面板控件背景图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the background image for the panel control.

value.span: 面板控件背景图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the background image for the panel control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定 panel 控件的背景图像的 URL。The property specifies the URL of the background image for the panel control. 若要使此属性正常工作，必须在指定位置存在图像文件。For this property to work, an image file must exist at the specified location. 如果无法访问指定的图像文件，则会显示面板控件而不显示背景图像。If the specified image file is not accessible, then the panel control is displayed without a background image. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将同一背景图像应用于两个 panel 控件： `Panel1` 和 `Panel2` 。The following code example applies the same background image to two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`. 要使此示例正常工作，你必须提供自己的映像。For this example to work correctly, you must provide your own image. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]

param.name: s
param.span: 对象，表示要复制的样式设置。

span.span: A object that represents the style settings to copy.

summary.span: 为 类的当前实例复制指定的 对象的样式属性。

span.span: Duplicates the style properties of the specified object for the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 方法为类的当前实例复制指定对象的样式设置 。You can use the method to duplicate the style settings of the specified object for the current instance of the class. 方法从指定的对象复制非空白元素 `s` 。The method copies non-blank elements from the specified object, `s`. 在中定义的任何元素都将 `s` 替换对象中定义的任何元素 。Any element that is defined in `s` replaces any element that is defined in the object. 若要仅替换对象中保留为空白的样式设置 ，请使用 方法。To replace only those style settings left blank in the object, use the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置在面板控件中显示包含文本的控件的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which to display controls that include text in a panel control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定在 panel 控件中显示包含文本的控件的方向。The property specifies the direction in which to display controls that include text in a panel control. 使用其中一个值设置属性 。The property is set using one of the values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置内容方向。The content direction is not set.| |`LeftToRight`|包含文本的子控件按从左到右的显示。Child controls that include text are displayed from left to right.| |`RightToLeft`|包含文本的子控件从右到左显示。Child controls that include text are displayed from right to left.| 如果指定 ，则包含文本的子控件从左到右显示。If you specify , child controls that include text display from left to right. 如果指定 ，则包含文本的子控件从右到左显示。If you specify , child controls that include text display right to left. 用于 显示从右向左书写的语言（例如阿拉伯语或希伯来语）的文本。Use to display text for languages that are written from right to left, such as Arabic or Hebrew. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 两个 panel 控件的属性 `Panel1` 和设置 `Panel2` 为 `ContentDirection.LeftToRight` 枚举值。The following code example sets the properties of two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`, to the `ContentDirection.LeftToRight` enumeration value. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]

exception.span: 该方向不是 值之一。

span.span: The direction is not one of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置面板控件中内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the contents within a panel control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定 panel 控件内内容的水平对齐方式。The property specifies the horizontal alignment of the contents within a panel control. 使用枚举值之一设置属性 。The property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置水平对齐方式。The horizontal alignment is not set.| |`Left`|面板的内容处于左对齐。The contents of the panel are left-aligned.| |`Center`|面板的内容处于中心位置。The contents of the panel are centered.| |`Right`|面板的内容是右对齐的。The contents of the panel are right-aligned.| > [!NOTE] > .. 如果将 属性设置为， 但属性是在包含 panel 控件的控件中设置的，则会从包含控件继承设置。If the property is set to but the property is set in the control that contains the panel control, the setting is inherited from the containing control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 两个 panel 控件的属性 `Panel1` 和设置 `Panel2` 为 `HorizontalAlign.Center` 枚举值。The following code example sets the properties of two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`, to the `HorizontalAlign.Center` enumeration value. 有关可用于运行示例的 .aspx 文件，请参阅 主题。For an .aspx file that can be used to run the example, see the topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]

exception.span: 水平对齐方式不是 值之一。

span.span: The horizontal alignment is not one of the values.

span.span: Combines the style settings of the specified object with the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 方法将指定对象的样式设置 与类的当前实例组合在一起 。You can use the method to combine the style settings of the specified object with the current instance of the class. 方法从指定的对象复制非空白元素， 但不 `s` 替换对象中的任何现有样式设置 。The method copies non-blank elements from the specified object, `s`, but does not replace any existing style settings in the object. 若要将对象中的样式设置替换为 中的样式设置 `s` ，请使用 方法。To replace the style settings in the object with the style settings in `s`, use the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置面板控件中滚动条的可见性和位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the visibility and position of scroll bars in a panel control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定面板控件中滚动条的可见性和位置。The property specifies the visibility and position of scroll bars in a panel control. 使用枚举值之一设置属性 。The property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|不显示任何滚动条。No scroll bars are shown.| |`Horizontal`|只显示水平滚动条。Only a horizontal scroll bar is shown.| |`Vertical`|只显示垂直滚动条。Only a vertical scroll bar is shown.| |`Both`|同时显示水平滚动条和垂直滚动条。Both horizontal and vertical scroll bars are shown.| |`Auto`|如有必要，将显示水平、垂直或同时显示这两个滚动条。If necessary, horizontal, vertical, or both scroll bars are shown. 要不然也可以不显示任何滚动条。Otherwise, no scroll bars are shown.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 两个 panel 控件的属性 `Panel1` 和设置 `Panel2` 为 `ScrollBars.Both` 枚举值。The following code example sets the properties of two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`, to the `ScrollBars.Both` enumeration value. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示面板中的内容是否换行的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the content wraps within the panel.

value.span: 如果面板中的内容换行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the content wraps within the panel; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示内容是否在面板内换行。The property indicates whether the content wraps within the panel. 当 属性设置为 `false` 且 属性设置为时 ，如果面板的内容超出面板的大小，则面板的内容将显示在具有水平滚动条的一行上。When the property is set to `false` and the property is set to , if the content of the panel is longer than what will fit in the panel, the content of the panel will appear on one line with a horizontal scroll bar. 如果 属性设置为 `false` ，并且属性设置为 ，则面板将扩展，如果需要，网页将具有水平滚动条。When the property is set to `false` and the property is set to , the panel will extend and if necessary the Web page will have a horizontal scroll bar. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 两个 panel 控件的属性设置为，并将设置为 `false` `Panel1` `Panel2` 。The following code example sets the property to `false` for two panel controls, `Panel1` and `Panel2`. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/CS/panelstyle.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.PanelStyle/VB/panelstyle.vb#2)]
